data.eml:eml: Phylogeny and taxonomic revision of the subgenus Velleius Leach (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Zong-Yi, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2015): Phylogeny and taxonomic revision of the subgenus Velleius Leach (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae). Zootaxa 3957 (3): 251-276, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.3.1
